attributes.action: Make cinemas stop charging excessive prices for the food they provide
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I was shocked when i went to the cinema for the first time in about 2 years that when i went to the food counter only to find a large popcorn and 1 large pepsi(watered down with ice may i add) came to £6.95!!!.
I know full well that if i had known that i would have taken my own food in but i'm sure i would have been challenged about this.I think it should be at least half the price and maybe people would make more use of their local facilities.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
